languages.text: "Устав предписывает назначать одного блюстителя на подобную процедуру, но предложение не лишено смысла. Вы думали о ком-то конкретном?"
"According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"
languages.original_text: "Устав предписывает назначать одного блюстителя на подобную процедуру, но предложение не лишено смысла. Вы думали о ком-то конкретном?"

traits.locale_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"
"According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty, but Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

"According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

languages.text: « La réglementation en vigueur stipule qu'un seul prévôt suffit à mener à bien cette tâche, mais votre proposition n'en est pas moins pertinente, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez quelqu'un de précis en tête ? »
languages.original_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

traits.locale_text: « La réglementation en vigueur stipule qu'un seul prévôt suffit à mener à bien cette tâche, mais votre proposition n'en est pas moins pertinente, Votre Seigneurie. Vous avez quelqu'un de précis en tête ? »

languages.text: «De acuerdo con las regulaciones, se necesita un guardia para esta tarea, pero su propuesta es razonable, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿Tiene a alguien concreto en mente?».
languages.original_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

traits.locale_text: «De acuerdo con las regulaciones, se necesita un guardia para esta tarea, pero su propuesta es razonable, mi{mf|lord|lady}. ¿Tiene a alguien concreto en mente?».

languages.text: “根据规定，执行这项任务只需要一名执法者，不过您的建议非常有道理，大人。您有什么特别合适的人选吗？”
languages.original_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

traits.locale_text: “根据规定，执行这项任务只需要一名执法者，不过您的建议非常有道理，大人。您有什么特别合适的人选吗？”

languages.text: 「規則によると、この仕事には一人のエンフォーサーが必要です。しかし陛下の提案は、理にかなっています。何か特定の案はありますか？」
languages.original_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

traits.locale_text: 「規則によると、この仕事には一人のエンフォーサーが必要です。しかし陛下の提案は、理にかなっています。何か特定の案はありますか？」

languages.text: "Laut Vorschrift ist für diese Aufgabe nur ein Enforcer nötig. Der Vorschlag Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ist jedoch vernünftig. Hattet Ihr jemand Bestimmten im Sinn?"
languages.original_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"

traits.locale_text: "Laut Vorschrift ist für diese Aufgabe nur ein Enforcer nötig. Der Vorschlag Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ist jedoch vernünftig. Hattet Ihr jemand Bestimmten im Sinn?"

languages.text: "Mevzuatta göre bu vazife için bir infazcının bulunması gerekir. Ancak {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin önerisi makul. Aklınızda belirli bir isim var mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "According to regulations, one enforcer is required for this duty; however, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s proposal is reasonable. Did you have someone specific in mind?"
